name: BoostBot
0:
”Alexa, ask boost bot when's next stream”
”Alexa, ask boost bot who Metsanauris is”
”Alexa, ask boost bot to tell me who Snaski is”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boost bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
BoostBot currently supports two features - you can ask it when the next Rocket League event is, and ask about Rocket League players and casters, and this skill will give you accurate and up-to-date information about them.

In order to ask when the next Rocket League event is, simply say "Alexa, ask Boost Bot when the next event is".

To get information about your favorite players, ask like this: "Alexa, ask Boost Bot who Metsanauris is". Note that while we support a majority of pro players from Rocket League Championship Series and Rocket League Rival Series, due to the nature of their in-game names, it may take a couple of tries to get Alexa to understand which player you mean.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
